tag_list: inbound-marketing-strategy, campaign-strategy, brand-development, project-management, creative-direction, b2b, b2c, advertising, marketing, public-relations
overview:
Director of Marketing - Branding & Inbound Marketing Strategist.

Vanessa has 17 years of marketing experience and passion for functional design and campaign strategy. As Director of Marketing for Kuno Creative, she works closely with our clients and Kuno team to plan, execute, and measure results and to help our clients build their brands.

Kuno Creative is an Inbound Marketing Agency and HubSpot Partner. We provide a full range of internet marketing services including HubSpot website design, traditional website design, SEO, SEM, SMO, call to action graphics, web banner ads, landing page design, blog writing and promotion, advanced content creation, email marketing, lead nurturing, and social media marketing services that will help you get found online and capture leads. We are a full service marketing company and can also help you with branding and traditional marketing campaigns.
